snippet: The age is lowered for next-day birth control, visiting Paraguay’s landlocked Guairá region, a cab-hailing app now approved in New York and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.

headline.main: Wednesday Reading: Age Lowered for Next-Day Birth Control Access
